content: NEW YORK  Nov 7 Rather than waiting to see how the Republican tax bill will fare in Congress  some investors are already picking out gingerly technology  healthcare and consumer companies they expect to use potential tax savings to buy back more of their own stock.
name: Toro Company (The)
title: U.S. investors target 'buyback stocks' in bet on Trump tax plan

content: LONDON Renault are more likely to use the Toro Rosso Formula One team to increase brand awareness than buy it from Red Bull  according to the energy drink company's motorsport consultant Helmut Marko.
name: Toro Company (The)
title: Renault more likely to back Toro Rosso than buy: Marko

content: LONDON  April 3 Renault are more likely to use the Toro Rosso Formula One team to increase brand awareness than buy it from Red Bull  according to the energy drink company's motorsport consultant Helmut Marko.
name: Toro Company (The)
title: Motor racing-Renault more likely to back Toro Rosso than buy - Marko
